description_i18n.de: Ordnet den VSIs Sicherheitsgruppen zu, um eingehenden und ausgehenden Datenverkehr von und zu Instanzen zu steuern.

description_i18n.ko: 보안 그룹을 VSI와 연계하여 인스턴스에 대한 인바운드 및 아웃바운드 트래픽을 제어합니다.

title_i18n.fr: Met à disposition des clés SSH

description_i18n.pt-BR: Provisiona e gerencia as chaves SSH para as VSIs para que seja possível administrar as instâncias de maneira segura.
description_i18n.zh-Hans: 供应和管理 VSI 的 SSH 密钥，以便您可以安全地管理实例。
description_i18n.zh-Hant: 供應及管理 VSI 的 SSH 金鑰，以便您可以安全地管理實例。

diagram.caption: VSI on VPC landing zone - QuickStart variation

diagrams.description: The QuickStart variation of the VSI on VPC landing zone deployable architecture creates a fully customizable Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) environment in a single region. The solution provides virtual servers in a secure VPC for your workloads. The QuickStart variation is designed to deploy quickly for demonstration and development.
